overview: From 2026-01-04 to 2026-01-05, elizaos/eliza had 0 new PRs (0 merged), 4 new issues, and 2 active contributors.

topIssues.title: Need to refresh for conversation to actually show as deleted when I delete it
topIssues.author: borisudovicic

topIssues.title: Agent "following"
topIssues.author: borisudovicic
topIssues.body:
If I click a public agent link, chat with it, then close the tab... how do I find it again? Currently I'd have to:

* Find the original link that was shared with me
* Remember the URL

That's broken. The conversation history exists, but it's orphaned.

## Automatic Addition, Separate Section

The menu sidebar needs two distinct areas:

```
MY AGENTS
  ├── Borko          ← you own this
  └── Assistant v2   ← you own this

FOLLOWING
  ├── Shaw's Agent   by @shaw      ← you talked to this
  └── CryptoBot      by @trader    ← you talked to this
```

If everything goes in "My Agents," it gets confusing:

* Which ones can I edit?
* Which ones do I own?
* Why can't I change this one's settings?

## Interaction Details

**When does an agent appear in Following?**

* As soon as you send your first message to a public agent you don't own

**Can you remove from Following?**

* Yes—hover reveals \[✕\] or right-click "Remove"
* Conversation history is deleted

**What if you Copy an agent you're Following?**

* The copy appears in **My Agents**
* Original stays in **Following**

**What if the creator makes the agent private? (not sure what's best here)**

* It stays in your Following list
* But shows "This agent is no longer public"
* Your past conversation history remains visible to you

topContributors.summary: borisudovicic: Focused on identifying and documenting potential improvements and issues within the ElizaOS project, creating four new issues including "Need to refresh for conversation to actually show as deleted ..." (elizaos/eliza#6322) and "Agent sorting doesn't work" (elizaos/eliza#6319).
